text: 46 was a common year starting on Saturday of the Julian calendar. At the time, it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Asiaticus and Silanus. == Events == * Dobruja is added into Roman Moesia * A census shows more than 6,000,000 Roman citizens * After the death of its king, Thracia becomes a Roman province * A drought and locusts cause a famine and a revolt at Xiongnu == Births == * Plutarch, Greek historian (approximate date) == Deaths == * Roimitalkes III of the Thracian Kingdom of Sapes Category:40s
